name: R4B-DocumentReference-R5-DocumentReference
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B DocumentReference into FHIR R5

target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference`

element.display: Who and/or what authored the document

target.display: Who and/or what authored the document
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.author` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `DocumentReference.author` - author has change due to type change: R4B `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `author`
R4B `DocumentReference.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.category`
R4B `DocumentReference.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.contained`
R4B `DocumentReference.content` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.content`

R4B `DocumentReference.content.attachment` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.content.attachment` - attachment has change due to type change: R4B `attachment` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `attachment`

R4B `DocumentReference.content.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.content.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DocumentReference.content.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.content.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.content.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.content.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `DocumentReference.context` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.context` - context changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); context has change due to type change: R4B context BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 context

element.display: Kind of facility where patient was seen
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Time of service that is being documented
Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.custodian` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.custodian`

element.display: When this document reference was created

target.display: When this document reference was created
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.date` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.date`

R4B `DocumentReference.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `DocumentReference.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description

target.display: registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | deprecated | unknown
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.docStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.docStatus` - docStatus has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `DocumentReference.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DocumentReference.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.id`
R4B `DocumentReference.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.implicitRules`
R4B `DocumentReference.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `DocumentReference.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.meta`

R4B `DocumentReference.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo`

target.display: The relationship type with another document
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.code` - code changed the binding strength from Required to Extensible; code has change due to type change: R4B code code has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 code

R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `DocumentReference.relatesTo.target` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.relatesTo.target`
R4B `DocumentReference.securityLabel` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.securityLabel` - securityLabel changed the binding strength from Extensible to Example

R4B `DocumentReference.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-reference-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-reference-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Who/what is the subject of the document

target.display: Who/what is the subject of the document
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.subject` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `DocumentReference.subject` - subject has change due to type change: R4B `subject` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `DocumentReference.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.text`
R4B `DocumentReference.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `DocumentReference.type`
